char_XXXX_ABCDEF.desc: When attacking target under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@extra_ep_damage_scale:0%}</> ATK as Elemental damage per second until the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</> end

When attacking target under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@extra_ep_damage_scale:0%}</> ATK as Elemental damage per second until the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</> end
Can summon Cherry-3 to assist in combat from a Tactical Point; Cherry-3 will automatically respawn 15s after being defeated and create Debris in the 4 surrounding tiles
